data.eml:eml: Two new species of the genus Irepacma Moriuti, Saito & Lewvanich (Lepidoptera: Oecophoridae) from Guizhou Province, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Jing-Jing, Wang, Shu-Xia (2011): Two new species of the genus Irepacma Moriuti, Saito & Lewvanich (Lepidoptera: Oecophoridae) from Guizhou Province, China. Zootaxa 2837: 86-88, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.277384
